attributes.action: Reject the petition of a second referendum of the UK leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215 This is a link to the conversed referendum petition.

http://www.historylearningsite.co.uk/british-politics/democracy/ This website and source clearly states what the definition of democracy is, how it works, and how it affects those who disagree with the majority vote - they have the chance to vote, if they lose it's tough luck. "The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few".
attributes.background: The current petition held by remain voters states that they demand a second referendum in which they hope to achieve more votes and win. However, this is an unfair representation of democracy and clearly shows a disregard for the voting system we have and how it works.
